`` In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wrote in a Feb. 9 email to employees. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. Steve Ballmer had apparently considered a number of internal and external candidates before choosing Satya Nadella , who will replace Bob Muglia.`` We are on a path to change the world again with our next generation

chief executive, Google said Thursday.Current CEO Eric Schmidt will assume the role of executive chairman and will focus on deals and external relations. Sergey Brin , the other Google co-founder, will focus on new products the company said. We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. change the world again with our next generation application development and cloud platform, and I feel fortunate to be part of this transformation,'' Satya Nadella wrote in a Feb. 9 e-mail to Server and Tools Business employees. Today we are seeing our existing customers move to the cloud to address issues of cost and complexity; tomorrow, our work as leaders in innovation will result in new scenarios and workloads... enabled in the cloud. Back in January, Steve Ballmer announced that Muglia's departure would herald the Server and Tools Business'`` move forward into the era of cloud computing,'' one that would apparently require`` new leadership.
